First.name: React Js
First.description: React is an open-source, front end, JavaScript library for building UIs or UI components. React can be used as a base in the development of single-page or mobile applications.

Second.name: Laravel
Second.description: Laravel is a free, open-source PHP web framework, created by Taylor Otwell and intended for the development of web applications following the model–view–controller (MVC) architectural pattern.

Third.name: Tailwind CSS
Third.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable and a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom UIs.

Fourth.name: Vue Js
Fourth.description: Vue.js is an open-source model–view–viewmodel front end JavaScript framework for building UIs and single-page applications.

Fifth.name: Vue Js
Fifth.description: Vue.js is an open-source model–view–viewmodel front end JavaScript framework for building UIs and single-page applications.

Sixth.name: Tailwind CSS
Sixth.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable and a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom UIs.
